sentences.sContent: The three years of the course are planned as a coherent whole.
sentences.sCn: 这三年的课程是作为连贯的整体来安排的。

sentences.sContent: a coherent account of the incident
sentences.sCn: 对该事件条理分明的陈述

synos.tran: [植]连贯的，一致的；明了的；清晰的；凝聚性的；互相偶合的；粘在一起的

remMethod.val: co + her(粘连) + ent → 粘连在一起 → 连贯的， 一致的

words.tran: 连贯地；前后一致地；条理清楚地；互相偶合地；凝聚性地
凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力

trans.tranOther: if a piece of writing, set of ideas etc is coherent, it is easy to understand because it is clear and reasonable
